GAME DESCRIPTION
Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.
EPISODE 2
Tony met Grayson at a friend’s birthday party last year. Handsome and clever, the guy exuded sex appeal from every pore and lit his body on fire. But Tony was happily married then, and despite the crazy chemistry, he stayed faithful to his husband - his biggest regret so far since his Ex stomped all over their marriage vows and made a fool out of him.
Gray gave Tony his card anyway and said to call him one day if he changed his mind.
Unable to stop thinking about him, Tony surprises Gray at his workplace, hoping to reconnect and give this crazy chemistry they have a chance.
Will Grayson be happy to see Tony?
Follow their Sex Adventure and find out!
